tooltip.keepYours: You are keeping your assessment of the highlighted element. By that the conflict will be escalated to all tutors that have assessed this element differently.
tooltip.acceptTheirs: You are taking over the existing assessment of the highlighted element. By that the conflict is resolved.

messages.escalationWarningTutors: You are about to escalate {{escalatedConflictsCount}} conflicts to the following affected {{tutorsEscalatingCount}} tutors:
messages.escalationWarningInstructors: You are about to escalate {{escalatedConflictsCount}} conflicts to an instructor
messages.submitFailedWithConflict: Submission failed! Conflict with existing Assessments detected
messages.noConflicts: Found no conflicts for you to handle!
messages.conflictsResolved: All conflicts have been handled. Submit your updated assessment to complete the conflict resolution.
messages.conflictResolutionInstructions: Decide for each conflict whether to keep your own assessment or to take over the already existing one.
